General.Name: B P Marsh and Partners PLC
General.Description: B.P. Marsh & Partners PLC engages in the provision of consulting services, making and trading in investments, and financial services businesses in the United Kingdom and internationally. The company primarily invests in financial services intermediary businesses, including insurance intermediaries, financial advisors, wealth and fund managers, and specialist advisory and consultancy firms. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, United Kingdom, SW1H 9NP
